Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime

Class MIMEUtils

java.lang.Object
org.bluezoo.gumdrop.mime.MIMEUtils
public final class MIMEUtils extends Object
Utility methods for MIME parsing and validation.
Author:
Chris Burdess

  • Method Details

    • isToken

      public static boolean isToken(String s)
      Checks if a string is a valid RFC 2045 token. A token is 1 or more characters from the set: !#$%&amp;'*+-.^_`{|}~0-9A-Za-z
      Parameters:
      s - the string to check
      Returns:
      true if the string is a valid token
      See Also:
      • RFC 2045

    • isTokenChar

      public static boolean isTokenChar(char c)
      Checks if a character is valid in an RFC 2045 token.
      Parameters:
      c - the character to check
      Returns:
      true if the character is valid in a token

    • isSpecial

      public static boolean isSpecial(char c)
      Checks if a character is a MIME tspecial (RFC 2045). These characters must be quoted in parameter values.
      Parameters:
      c - the character to check
      Returns:
      true if the character is a tspecial

    • isValidBoundary

      public static boolean isValidBoundary(String boundary)
      Validates MIME boundary strings according to RFC 2046. A boundary is 1-70 characters from the set: 0-9A-Za-z'()+_,-./:=?
      Parameters:
      boundary - the boundary string to validate
      Returns:
      true if valid, false otherwise
      See Also:
      • RFC 2046

    • isBoundaryChar

      public static boolean isBoundaryChar(char c)
      Checks if a character is valid in a MIME boundary.
      Parameters:
      c - the character to check
      Returns:
      true if valid in a boundary
